biotools.summary: The Transmembrane helix: Simple Or Complex (TMSOC) webserver identifies the simple and complex transmembrane helices in a protein sequence. Simple TM helices are then masked prior to sequence similarity searches to decrease the false discovery rate of similarity searches.

bioschemas.name: TMSOC
bioschemas.summary: The Transmembrane helix: Simple Or Complex (TMSOC) webserver identifies the simple and complex transmembrane helices in a protein sequence. Simple TM helices are then masked prior to sequence similarity searches to decrease the false discovery rate of similarity searches.
